mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, WRITER) VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, WRITER FROM NOTICE ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
SELECT ID, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, WRITER FROM NOTICE WHERE ID = #{id}
